body_html:
It'll probably in master tonight or tomorrow

On Thu, Aug 25, 2016 at 3:24 PM, Andrew Gibiansky notifications@github.com
wrote:

@vrv https://github.com/vrv BTW: By implementing a very hacky version
of this patch, I have confirmed that with this fix will allow you to use
Tensorflow with CUDA IPC. (My hacky version just edited cuda_platform.cc to
always select just one GPU based on an environment variable, and to return
1 for VisibleDeviceCount()). So definitely looking forward to this patch
landing in Tensorflow master – do you know a rough ETA for this? Thank you!!

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#1888 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAcTeV18AB9kj1oOIZL15pAyWHGD-V2iks5qjhYUgaJpZM4IFrBD
.
